Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for reporting the race, ethnicity and salary ranges of women employed in service of the state
Summary: Reports the number of women employed in each office and/or position in the service of the state and the race, ethnicity and salary range of each such employee.
LawCode: Amd ยง12, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to reporting the race, ethnicity and salary ranges for women employed in service of the state
